720368f-a.text:
116 Henry Street, south side, between Pike and Rutgers
Street, showing P.3. 2.
Board of Education, N.Y.C.
720368f-a.folder: Henry Street & Pike Street, Manhattan, NY

722578f-a.text:
Pike Street, at the N.W. corner of Henry Street. Also shown is Henry Street, north side, at Pike Street.
July 25, 1931.
P.L. Sperr.
722578f-a.folder: Pike Street & Henry Street, Manhattan, NY

722579f-c.text:
(1)
Pike Street, west side, north from but not including Henry, to and including Division Streets. Also shown is 114-116 Division Street, (in the background, north side, between Allen and Orchard Streets.)
July 2S, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, further north, from and including East Broadway, to and including Division Street.
July 25, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(3)
The same, as No. 2, but at a later date, showing razing of buildings for the widening of Allen Street.
September 7, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
722579f-c.folder: Pike Street & Henry Street, Manhattan, NY
